about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Kenvi Jewels Ltd(KJL) is Ahmedabad based commpany engaged in manufacturing and retailing of jewellery. Company also engaged into wholesaling and trading of gold jewellery. Kenvi Jewels sell gold jewellery made with or without studded diamonds, precious and semi-precious stones. Company's product portfolio includes Wedding Jewellery, Festive Jewellery, Rings, Chain, Earrings, Ear Chain, Nose-rings/Nose pins, Waist belts, Mangalsutra, Anklet, Zuda, Toe Ring, Pendant Set/ Pendant, Bracelet and Bangles.

Kenvi Jewels retail business is done through its showroom situated at Odhav, Ahmedabad. KJL sell its jewellery under the brand name of 'Suvarnakrupa'. KJL buy its raw materials from bullion market & local markets in Ahmedabad which is then designed and moulded into gold jewellery.

faqs.question: What is the Kenvi Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer:
Kenvi Jewels IPO is a SME IPO of 1860000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.70 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 2, 2018, and closes on February 7, 2018.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Kenvi Jewels IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Kenvi Jewels IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Kenvi Jewels IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Kenvi Jewels IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Kenvi Jewels IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Kenvi Jewels IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Kenvi Jewels IPO opens on February 2, 2018 and closes on February 7, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Kenvi Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: Kenvi Jewels IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Kenvi Jewels IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Kenvi Jewels IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Kenvi Jewels IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Kenvi Jewels IPO will be done on Monday, February 12, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, February 14, 2018. Check the Kenvi Jewels IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Kenvi Jewels IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Kenvi Jewels IPO listing date is on Friday, February 16, 2018.
